examples.example: 因为有家人的陪伴和支持，我的生活总是充满了温馨和幸福。

translate.english: Because of the company and support of my family, my life is always filled with warmth and happiness.

examples.example: 无论遇到什么困难，家人永远是我最坚实的后盾。

translate.english: No matter what difficulties are encountered, family members will always be my strongest backing.

examples.example: 家人的爱是最温暖的港湾，让我无论走到哪里都心怀牵挂。

translate.english: The love of family is the warmest harbor, which makes me care no matter where I go.
